body: UITour does this in https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/components/uitour/content-UITour.js. It gets registered on the browser message manager in https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/base/content/browser.js#1159, but @Mossop says we can just use `Services.mm` instead (see https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/toolkit/modules/Services.jsm?q=path%3Aservices.jsm&redirect_type=single#51).
body_text: UITour does this in https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/components/uitour/content-UITour.js. It gets registered on the browser message manager in https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/base/content/browser.js#1159, but @Mossop says we can just use Services.mm instead (see https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/toolkit/modules/Services.jsm?q=path%3Aservices.jsm&redirect_type=single#51).
